explanation: [0-0] Three girls are standing in front of a green hedge with a white cloth spread on the ground. The girls are all wearing white sneakers. The girl on the left is wearing a green suit, the one in the middle is wearing a red suit, and the one on the right is wearing a white suit. Each of them is holding a wooden board with some rice grains on it. Behind the hedge are several large green trees and some buildings.

[0-7] The girl in the middle lifts the board over her head, the rice grains on the board fly up, and the colorful rice grains in the middle spell the word "Merry". Then she takes a step back, and the woman in the white suit on the right steps forward, lifts the board, and the red rice grains spell out "Christmas" in the air.
